item.title: My Dicine – Customized Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post My Dicine – Customized Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
My Dicine

My Dicine is an online medical store customized mobile application used to buy pharmacy items online.  It’s an online pharmacy where user can get their medication without any difficulty. This apps allows users to buy healthcare products, over-the-counter products & medical equipment online.

About My Dicine Application

My Dicine is a customized mobile application for e-Pharmacies that allows users to get medicine online at any time anywhere. This application allows the user to register their pharmacy with simple steps. With this application, they will be able to serve the customers at large.

My Dicine mobile application is a hybrid mobile application. With the development of e-Pharmacies, purchasing medications has become easier. Users can get register their medical shop and sell their medicine online. This healthcare app lets you register your licensed retail pharmacies and make them sell online.

My Dicine - Features

My Dicine is one of the most innovative and well-designed online pharmacy applications. This customized mobile application saves time by using our super-fast search bar to order medicines without having to go through the whole catalog, examine the medicine’s full composition, and search for medicines.

This application brings all of your locations under one digital range and delivers a consistent user experience across all of your pharmacies. Develop a smooth online prescription ordering and delivery app platform to boost the ROI of your existing pharmacy business.

With this application Never be without your essential medications. Customers can opt to have their prescriptions automatically refilled, ensuring that they never run out. Refill schedules can be changed by customers. My dicine online pharmacy is developed to offer your retail store a fresh appearance and attract more clients, allowing you to grow your business.

Technology We Used

Hybrid Application

  • Ionic 2
  • Angular JS2

Why Need My Dicine

Increased access to medications for those who are restricted to their homes.

The convenience of comparing many sites to find the best pricing and items.

Bring all your branches under one digital range.

Instead of counting pills, pharmacists can focus on the therapeutic requirements of their patients.

Savings for both patients and payers are possible.

Larger prescription quantities can be accommodated.

Medication adherence is improved.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

item.title: Alive
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Alive appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Alive

ALIVE is an online Gym search mobile application, in which users can search for nearby gyms and Fitness centers, users can pay fees online. This makes your gym more visible to the customers. This application gives your customers a more personalized experience.

About Alive Application

ALIVE is a mobile application that allows users to search the nearest gym. In this mobile application, you can search gym near your location. This application makes your gym more visible to the customers.

ALIVE mobile application is a hybrid mobile application. Users can get information about the gym by simply searching it. They can also book their session by choosing the session they want with online payment.

Alive - Features

Log In Page

Users can log in to the alive mobile application with their mobile number. Using your login to keep an internal profile of each customer is a wonderful method to customize your assistance.

Category Page

Alive category page includes the services provided by the gyms. The services are split up into two categories economic and premium.  The users can choose the category according to their needs. This makes your service more personalized for users.

Search Page

App search is useful because it allows your users to easily access all of the material you provide. Through the search page, you can easily analyze the most searched gym or most searched services. This way you’ll be able to know what users prefer.

Gym Filter

ALIVE gym filter gives easy access to choose the services you need. This filter includes the category (economic and premium) and the services like the exercise tools (treadmill, cycling). Rooms infrastructure (a.c and non a.c). 

Technology We Used

Hybrid Application

  • Ionic 2
  • Angular JS4

Why Need Alive

Gives a more personalized experience.

User-friendly application.

More visible to customers.

Secured online payment.

Filters to make it easier to choose the service they need.

Easy navigation.

Reducing development time and costs since it’s a hybrid application.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

item.title: News 11
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post News 11 appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
News 11

News 11 is an Online News Services mobile application that is developed in the Tamil language with vast features. This application provides the recent news by categorizing it.

About News 11 Application

News 11 is an online news service mobile application that helps the user to get recent news at any time from anywhere. This application is deployed as a native mobile application. This application helps the users find their favorite news inside big national trends.

News 11 mobile application allows the user to get the latest news and also allows the user to read the news according to their choice with categorized news. They can add their favorite news. To keep the readers connected this application allows you to notify the latest news. 

News 11 - Features

Recent News Page

The recent news provides the users with the recent news happened a few hours or a few days ago. This feature attracts the user since it provides the updated news. The recent news keeps the users connected with you. This increases the user’s rate. With the help of the search bar the user to search the news, they want to read or need to know the details of the news. 

Categorized News Page

For example in the regular newspaper, some readers may read every news but some may skip and read-only their favorite session.  Therefore it is important to categories your news and makes it easy for readers to choose what they wanna read. The category includes business news, sports news, political news, and world news, etc.

Popular News Page

The popular news page shows the users the news that is trending around the world, or around the country, or the state. This keeps the users with the trending news. This feature attracts users since they get the trending news just within few minutes.

Favorites News Page

This feature gives the user a personalized experience. The user can save their favorite news in this feature. This allows the users to view their favorite news. They can view their favorite news anytime and have a user-friendly experience. 

Notification

To keep connected with the users you need to show them your existence. This feature allows the latest or trending news visible to the reader by providing the notification. This increases your engagement with readers higher. 

Technology We Used

Native Application

  • Java
  • XML

Why Need News 11

Keep connected with your reader by notifying them.

Reach more readers with e-News paper.

Higher engagement with readers.

Makes it easy for the reader by categorizing the news.

Provides news updates 24/7.

User-friendly navigation.

Help users find their favorite news inside big national trends.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

item.title: Aldeazon – eCommerce Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Aldeazon – eCommerce Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Aldeazon

Aldeazon is an eCommerce mobile and web application. This is a hybrid application where users can purchase their agriculture commodities. This application contains all the necessary commodities for agriculture.

About Aldeazon Application

Aldeazon is an eCommerce mobile and web application that allows users to purchase their agricultural commodities. The mobile application includes the category, shop, orders, shipping details, and wish list.

Aldeazon web application includes the Admin Portal, Procurement Portal shows all orders,  Supplier Portal, Credit Officer Portal for payment detail, and Transport Portal contains the delivery detail and driver detail.

Aldeazon Features

Mobile Application

Home Page

The home page of this application allows users to navigate to the other feature. The home pages show the recent popular item and the most viewed item so that users can easily know about the items and it increases the sales.

Category Page

This page makes it easier for the customer to choose the product they want in a short time. This feature came with a category of the product along with the number of items in those categories.

Shop

The shop page shows the list of items, you can sort the item by choosing it from the category. This gives the user more visibility of the item. They can easily get their item with this feature. 

Cart & Wish list Page

Aldeazon reduces the cart’s abundant rate since their favorite product can be added to the wish list and they can purchase it later. This feature helps you to find the customer’s most purchased items through their wish list.

Product Detail Page

The product detail page shows the information about the product in detail. This provides information on the product, technical description. This helps the customer to know completely about the product.

Web Application

Admin Portal

The admin has the access to all the other portals. They can add products, categories and check the delivery and driver detail. They can monitor the payment and the supplier detail too. 

Procurement Portal

The procurement portal is where all the orders have been placed. They can view the placed order with Product name, quantity, and date. This way they can maintain the orders data.

Credit Officer Portal

The Credit officer portal provides the payment detail of all the commodities. The Payment details can be downloaded at any time. This feature helps you to maintain payment records.

Transport Portal

This feature maintains the delivery details, and Drivers details. The delivery detail includes the product name, quantity, delivery status, delivery address. The driver details include the name of the driver, phone number, vehicle number. 

Technology We Used

Hybrid Application

  • Laravel
  • MySQL DB
  • Bootstrap
  • JQuery

Why Need Aldeazon Application

Increase your sales on agricultural commodities

Attract global customers.

Easy checkout.

Easy product management.

Maintain the payment details and delivery details.

Reduce the cart abundant with the wish list.

Ease the purchase by categorizing the items.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

I would like to discuss:

The post Aldeazon – eCommerce Application appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Travel Booking
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Travel Booking appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Travel Booking

Managing the travels manually must be hard. We provide the solution to ease your work with a hybrid application.

About Travel Booking Application

Travel booking is a user’s manual booking system. This application helps you in booking, maintaining drivers, and admin using the application. This application includes Booking details, Driver details, Reports, booking history.

This application is deployed with a Hybrid application. This application is for both web and mobile. This application is highly scalable and performing. The advanced feature in this application makes this easy for you to manage your business.

For Web Application

Booking Office Details

This feature helps to book the service for the company. With this feature, you can easily book the vehicle for your guests and allocate the driver. The details of the booking will be displayed along with the company name, contact number, and name of the person. You can view the previous booking. This helps you to maintain the guest’s booking history.

Booking Details

The booking details include the guest’s name, contact number, booking date and time, pickup and drop location. This also includes the driver’s detail like name, contact number, mobile number, vehicle number, and model of vehicle. The detail can be sent to the guest through SMS. These details can be edited and viewed which avoids confusion.

Export Details

The export details can be downloaded just with the detail of date, company name, vehicle number, and driver’s name. With this, it helps you won’t miss any of the details of your guests.

Booking History

The booking history of the guests includes name, contact number, booking date, booking time, pickup, and drop location. With this, you can view your guest’s booking at any time.

For Mobile Application

Book Ride

The mobile application is only for the driver. They have an individual login id. The book ride includes the details of the guest, pick up and drop location, Ride starting time and ending time, ride starting and ending kilometers, the signature of driver and guest. With this, you can provide your customer an on-time pick-up and drop.

Technology We Used

Laravel

MySQL DB

Bootstrap

JQuery

Why Need Travel Booking Application

Easy maintenance on booking details.

Download the export report anytime.

Avoid confusion between customers.

View the previous travel details.

Maintenance of the driver.

Easy calculation on travel distance and time.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

The post Travel Booking appeared first on Hasotech.

item.title: Prime Card – An On-Demand Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Prime Card – An On-Demand Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Prime Card

Prime Card is an on-demand mobile application used for hotels near your location or at your current location. Makes your hotel more apparent to your customer and by offering rewards to hold your customer for a long time.

About Prime Card Application

Prime Card is an on-demand Mobile Application that is mainly developed for hotels to make them visible for the customers by allowing the user to find the hotels near them with the location. With this application, you can make your hotel more apparent to your customer.

Prime Card has a unique feature on login. It provides biometric authentication with fingerprint and face id unlock. Along with biometric authentication, this application allows you to refer a friend, offer a gift card, and show the hotels in both map view and list view.

Prime Card - Features

Biometric Authentication

After the sign-in users can log in with the user id and password or they can use biometric authentication. The biometric authentication used in this application is fingerprint and face id. This increases the security of the Prime Card application. It gives a new user experience to the users.  You can also log in as a guest.

Hotel Search

You can search the hotel according to your current location and you can search by nearby location. You can view the hotels in two ways either by map view or by list view. Registering your hotel in this application makes your business more visible to the customers.

Refer A Friend

Users can refer a friend to this application and both of them can get rewards. This feature gives a major advantage by attracting customers. You can refer a friend with a simple procedure by proving their name, mail id, number.

Technology We Used

Ionic

Angular

PHP

Why Need Prime Card Application

Easy way to find a hotel near you.

Makes your hotel more apparent to your customer.

Rewards to hold your customer for a long time.

Advanced Biometric authentication.

Lets the customer know about the travel offers you provide.

Map view to know your location accurately.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

item.title: Amaz4u – eCommerce Web And Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Amaz4u – eCommerce Web And Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Amaz4u

Amaz4u is an eCommerce mobile and web application. This is a hybrid application where users can purchase their products. By having an eCommerce application you can increase your ROI.

About Amaz4u Application

Amaz4u is an eCommerce mobile and web application that allows users to shop. In this mobile application, you can shop by choosing the category, home page contains the offers and other categories,  there will be an easy checkout process and payment method.

Amaz4u web application has the same features as the mobile application. Having both mobile and web application for an eCommerce increase your customer rate and increase your customer engagement.

Amaz4u- Features

Amaz4u - Mobile Application

Home Page

The home page of this application navigates the user to the Category page,  Cart page. The home page will show some of the latest offers and deals and categories.

Category Page

This page makes it easier for the customer to choose the product they want in a short time. With this feature, you can boost up your sales and make your products more apparent to your customers.

Cart Page

The Cart page is where users can view their product to be purchased. The users may add items to their shopping cart and then pay online. With this cart page, you can get to know about the user’s preference.

Checkout Page

Amaz4u makes an easy checkout page. The checkout process is simple in this so that you can reduce the cart abundance.  Making a simple checkout page use increases the purchase.

Payment

Payment can be done both online and offline. The payment process is simple and more secure. Once the payment is done user will get the confirmation notification to confirm their order.  

Amaz4u - Web Application

Web Application

The web application has the same feature as in the mobile application like home page, cart page, category page, checkout, and payment page. Having both web applications and mobile applications will benefit your eCommerce business. This makes the customer more convenient and increases your ROI. This enhances your customer engagement and better brand recognition. 

Technology We Used

Hybrid Application

  • Ionic 2
  • Angular JS2

Why Need Amaz4u Application

More apparent to customers.

Easy online payments method.

Easy subscription maintenance.

Better customer engagement.

Maintain vehicle details.

Better and easy access to your customers with your nearby branches.

Holds the customer for a long time.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

item.title: Carwash – Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post Carwash – Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
Carwash

Provide easy access to your customers with nearby branches of your service. We provide a solution by deploying a mobile application to increase your customer engagement and make your business more visible to customers.

About Carwash Application

Car Wash is a mobile application used for your business to provide better customer engagement and easy access to reach the nearby location.  This application makes your business more apparent to the customers. 

This application is deployed for car washing services. This allows your location to the customers in search of car wash service. The advanced feature makes it easy to use. This includes the search of service centers in a nearby location, online payment, subscription management, and vehicle detail.

Carwash - Features

List Of Service Center

A list of car services at your location will be shown. The list helps your business more visible to the customers. The car service centers at a particular location will be listed through registration. This will provide easy access to your customers to reach your branch near them.

Payment

The payment has both online and offline methods. This makes the customer more comfortable and convenient. It’s easy to set up an online payment option, and you may start selling within minutes of doing so. Customers today tend to trust retailers who accept online payments more than those who don’t.

Subscription

Subscriptions plans are for 1 year with a code generator. This subscription plan helps you to hold your customer for a long time. You can able build a good bond with the customers.

Location

You’ll be visible to more customers near your location. It gives better and easy access to your customers. It’ll be more convenient for the customer to access the nearby center for their services.

Profile and Vehicle Details

The profile details include the name, mobile number, and password for the login. The vehicle details include the number of the car you can add the details to it. With this, you can change your details.

Review

After the service, the customer can review their service. This helps the other customer to know about your services. This increases the trust of the customers and notices your work.

Technology We Used

Ionic

Angular

PHP

Why Need CarwashApplication

More apparent to customers.

Easy online payments method.

Easy subscription maintenance.

Better customer engagement.

Maintain vehicle details.

Better and easy access to your customers with your nearby branches.

Holds the customer for a long time.

item.title: BeautyConnect – Native Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post BeautyConnect – Native Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
BeautyConnect - Native Application

BeautyConnect is an easy-to-use native mobile application with extensive features for everyone. Using BeautyConnect, you’ll be able to access beauty parlors and other beauty care services from the comfort of your home. Get groomed with BeautyConnect mobile application.

About BeautyConnect Application

BeautyConnect is a native mobile application that allows customers to book their preferred parlors and beauty centers for treatments, as well as access and buy personalized goods online. Now, booking a local beauty parlor is as simple as a click away.

With BeautyConnect allows users to book their appointment in their preferred parlor. In addition to booking appointments, you may also pick the service you want and purchase their goods using both offline and online payment options.

Book Your Appointment

Users may easily search for, discover, and book their favorite parlors and other services. This allows the user to book their appointments by seeing the availability of the parlor timing. Booking can be done simply by searching your location Pincode and choosing your gender.

Parlor Services

After selecting the timing of the preferred parlor you’ll be choosing the services you want. The services include hair, skin, nail, treatment. The gives you a personalized experience and saves your time. 

Parlor Lists

The parlor details help you to know about the parlor. This detail includes the parlor’s name, office types like a head office or branch, address, and contact detail. This also includes the service and session details. This gives assurance to the customers.

Payment

The payment option includes both online and offline payment. The offline feature such as cash on delivery and online payment include the UPI payments. By providing the contact info your payment will be completed. Easy checkout process. BeautyConnect makes the payment in a secured way.

Offer Details

This feature shows the offer you provide to your customer with a notification. This can attract the customer and hold your customer for a long time. This helps you to increase your customer engagement.

Technology We Used

Native Application

  • Java
  • XML

Why Need BeautyConnect Application

Easy accessible.

Get more visible to customers nearby your parlor.

Save time by booking online.

Connect with customers 24/7.

Offer & notification to hold your customers.

Book according to your availability.

User friendly.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead

item.title: MRNS A Web And Mobile Application
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The post MRNS A Web And Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
item.content:encoded:
MRNS

Calculating Laden and Unladen weight in the vehicle for the construction site might be difficult. We make it easy for you by providing a Web and mobile applications.

About MRNS Application

The MRNS application is to maintain the work on the construction site. This is a web and mobile application that includes the records of laden and unladen weight, material grade, material categories, thermal print, syncing data online.

The mobile application is deployed for the operator, supervisor whereas the web application is for the admin who has control over the operator and supervisor.  This application is mainly to maintain the record and to calculate the total weight. This application makes your work easy on the construction site.

For Mobile Application

For Operator

Records

The operator can create a new record to maintain the material, vehicle number, supplier name, laden and unladen weight, quantity. By this, the record can be created without any error. These records can be viewed at any time.

Sync

The created record will be automatically or manually to the supervisor. This feature makes it easy for sharing the records between the operator and supervisor. With this, they can get the record at no time. Avoid manual errors while sharing the records.

For Supervisor

Records

The records from the operators will be synced to them. They can view the record at any time. They get all records submitted by the operators. This feature will be useful for them to maintain the record for checking.

Offline

The submitted records will be approved or rejected either online or offline. This feature is mainly because of the construction site network. The work won’t be paused because of the network. They can continue their work without any disturbance.

Thermal Print

The approved records will be printed. With this, you can easily create the manual records in no time. This assures the record that can be printed in no time. You can print the approved record at any time.

Web Application

The web application is deployed for the admin who can maintain the whole. It includes the operators, supervisors, materials, and projects. They can manage these with the web application. They can save time and can maintain the report at any time. 

Technology We Used

Ionic

Angular

PHP

Why Need MRNS Application

Easy Way To Calculate The Total Weight.

Easy Billing.

Avoid Manual Errors.

Sync The Data Automatically Or Manually.

Maintain And Get The Records Automatically.

Avoid Confusion In Records By Approving And Rejecting.

REQUEST A CALL BACK

We are always ahead
Professional Solutions for You

I would like to discuss:

[contact-form-7]

The post MRNS A Web And Mobile Application appeared first on Hasotech.
